activeProjects.title: Portfolio Website
activeProjects.description: My portfolio website is where i showcase all of the projects that i have undertaken while learning web development. I used Vite, React, Typescript, SCSS and firebase for this project.

activeProjects.title: Assembly Sync
activeProjects.description: Assembly Sync is an application i am creating to solve an issue at work where we need dashboards for our orders that is linked to a schedule while being easy to use. I am using the UI from shadcn for this project.
